short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables various additional features on Mojang's bug tracker Mojira for helpers, moderators, and other Mojira power users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a browser extension enabling various additional features on Mojang's bug tracker Mojira (https://bugs.mojang.com/) for helpers, moderators, and other Mojira power users.

Please note that the helper messages included in this extension may only be used by Mojira helpers, moderators, and Mojang staff.

For more information, check out the GitHub page at https://github.com/mojira/mojira-plus
